Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Internet Pioneer Technology is a distributed cloud data center operator, headquartered in Shenzhen, our customer demand-driven, flexible, customizable network solutions as the core technology for enterprises to provide high-quality data center resources, cloud computing resources, Internet solutions, is committed to becoming a digital transformation of the enterprise network technology consultants.

Since its establishment in 2010, the company has been developing rapidly, and has obtained the qualifications of IDC, ISP and cloud computing from the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology of the State Council, and is a member unit of Asia-Pacific APNIC, and has been awarded the certificates of “National High and New Technology Enterprise” and “Double-soft Enterprise Certification”, providing enterprises with services ranging from consulting, implementation to post-processing. We provide one-stop services from consulting, implementation to post operation and maintenance for enterprises, and have won the trust of customers with our professional and high-quality services in the field of Internet.
